item.title: Online Meeting 2019-09-28
item.dc:creator: how
item.description:
Oops, I missed that one. I have read the minutes. Interestingly, if it are all waiting on me to get started, you should know that I am waiting on you to launch the forum: so far must of what was proposed at Things to be done before announcing the forum was fine, except what requires collective decision, and who is taking charge of which groups.

I guess if nobody takes charge at this point we might as well pick up the other remaining tasks and launch as soon as we can.

Read full topic
